Research Gallery

Welcome to my gallery! Here, I share moments from my journey as a researcher and engineer. This page captures my experiences in the lab, EEG recording sessions, and other highlights from my work in Cognitive NeuroEngineering. Each image tells a story of discovery, innovation, and the pursuit of understanding the human brain. Explore to get a glimpse into my world of research and experimentation.
